ESRS Implementation Q&A Platform – Compilation of Explanations January – November 2024
ESRS reference
ESRS 1 chapters 5.1 Reporting undertaking and value chain and 7.6 Consolidated reporting and
subsidiary exemption
Key terms
Materiality assessment; private equity structures; general and limited partner
Background
Private equity (PE) structures usually have a general partner (GP) and limited partners (LPs). GP
